item.title: The Importance of UX and a Guided Introduction
item.description: Exploring the UX of Pokemon Go As with everyone else I picked up Pokemon Go when it released in the US this Wednesday. After pouring more than a couple hours in to it, and talking with a lot of people I have a few thoughts on the UX of the app and how it could be improved. Guided Introduction Issues When you load up the game you’re dropped directly into the game (when the servers load, but that’s a whole different issue).
